review: Finally got rid of our cable bill, saved well over 100.00 bucks a month... using the Roku with Hulu Plus and a few other sights to watch current stuff on. I am so happy with this little device, $8.00 a month for Hulu Plus and the little Roku also allows my windows 8 to project thru to the big screen, making a HDMI cable totally unnecessary. Finally i listen to youtube videos thru my surrond sound that is connected to the tv thru the roku and no wires.. i feel so technologically superiour now....LOL ...  since dropping cable, and getting my Ruku, also buying a little Magic Jack Plus, which hooks into my wi fi, i have dramatically saved on my monthly bills. ..no phone bill and now no cable bill.  in my opinion Ruku is the future, and cable and satellite companies will soon fade like the cassette tape or 8 track player. who needs em... when there are alternatives like this.. i am thinking of signing up for an amazon credit card so i can get a 30 buck amazon credit and use it to purchase a second Roku to give as a gift to my mother.
